item.title: Since my name is Jacob, I better know what the Jacobian is...
item.description: Introduction I figured that since my name is Jacob, I better know what the Jacobian is - just in case someone asks me. I stumbled upon this YouTube video about the Jacobian today and gave it a watch. I recalled using the Jacobian back in college; but at the time, I had never invested much time into learning what it actually was. Plus this gives me a good excuse to practice my Tex math notation.
